title: Color Palette
description: Color-Palette is a web tool for quickly and intuitively generating color palettes, ideal for web design and visual projects.
ariaLabel: Open Color Palette project: a web tool to generate color palettes

title: Pokedex
description: Pokedex is a web application for quickly and easily searching for and viewing information about Pokémon.
ariaLabel: Open Pokedex project: a web app to search and view Pokémon information

title: Midas touch
description: Midas Touch is a landing page that promotes new talent through training, mentoring, and opportunities for professional growth.
ariaLabel: Open Midas Touch project: landing page that supports new talent with training and mentorship

title: Nasa
description: NASA is a space-themed website that displays the Astronomical Image of the Day, offering a daily image of the universe accompanied by a brief explanation from an astronomer. With a modern and responsive interface, it invites users to explore cosmic phenomena in a visual and accessible way.
ariaLabel: Open Nasa project: space site displaying the Astronomical Image of the Day with a daily astronomer explanation

title: AniDex
description: AniDex is a website for quickly and easily searching and exploring information about anime series.
ariaLabel: Open AniDex project: a website to search and explore anime information

title: Rick and Morty
description: Rick and Morty is a website for quickly exploring characters, locations, and facts from the series in a visual way.
ariaLabel: Open Rick and Morty project: a site to explore characters and information from the series

title: Dragon Ball
description: Dragon Ball is a website for quickly and visually exploring characters and information from the Dragon Ball universe.
ariaLabel: Open Dragon Ball project: a site to explore characters and information from the Dragon Ball universe

title: Free Games
description: Free Games is a web application that provides a list of free games available on the Epic Games Store. It allows users to view game details, including images, descriptions, and links to the Epic Games Store.
ariaLabel: Open Free Games project: a site to view free games and their details

title: Countries
description: Countries is a website for quickly and visually searching and consulting data on countries around the world.
ariaLabel: Open Countries project: website to quickly search and view information about countries worldwide

title: Caesar-Cipher
description: Caesar-Cipher is a web tool that encrypts and decrypts text using Caesar cipher, ideal for learning basic cryptography with a simple and accessible interface.
ariaLabel: Open Caesar-Cipher project: encrypt and decrypt text using the Caesar cipher

title: Random Color Generation
description: Random color generator with one click. Displays color codes for quick use in design or development, with a simple and responsive interface.
ariaLabel: Open Random Color Generation project: generate random colors instantly with codes for design and development

title: Portfolio v1
description: Portfolio v1 is a personal website that showcases the author's web projects with a clear and responsive presentation, highlighting development technologies and skills.
ariaLabel: Open Portfolio v1 project: a personal website showcasing web development projects and skills.

title: Brisa de Paz
description: Brisa de Paz is a website that showcases fragrances and personal care products in an attractive and easy-to-browse format.
ariaLabel: Open Brisa de Paz website to explore fragrances and personal care products
